mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_menu (MENU_NM, MENU_PRC, MENU_DESC, MENU_STOCK_QTY, MENU_DISP_YN, MENU_IMG_NM) VALUES ( #{menuNm}, #{menuPrc}, #{menuDesc}, #{menuStockQty}, #{menuDispYn}, #{fileNm} )
mapper.update: update tb_menu set MENU_NM = #{menuNm}, MENU_PRC = #{menuPrc}, MENU_DESC = #{menuDesc}, MENU_STOCK_QTY = #{menuStockQty}, MENU_DISP_YN = #{menuDispYn} where MENU_NO = #{menuNo}
